column7: company_profile
Berke Textiles, through its subsidiaries, is engaged in various forms of textile production and distribution. The company is headquartered in Bursa, Turkey.

Fast Retailing is an apparel retailer that operates Uniqlo and other brands. The company was formerly known as Ogori Shoji and changed its name to Fast Retailing in September 1991. Fast Retailing is based in Yamaguchi, Japan, and was founded in 1949.

column5: Sinotruk (China National Heavy Duty Truck Group) (CNHTC)
column6: Sinotruk (China National Heavy Duty Truck Group) (CNHTC)
column7: Sinotruk (China National Heavy Duty Truck Group) (CNHTC) (Sinotruk Group) develops, manufactures, and sells trucks, special trucks, buses, special vehicles, engines and engine units, auto parts, and special chassis products. It sells its products in China, as well as exports internationally. CNHTC was formerly known as Jinan General Auto Works Plant and changed its name in 2001. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Jinan, China.
Association Familiale Mulliez (AFM) is the holding company for Adeon, Agapes, Auchan, and other firms. AFM was established in 1955 and is headquartered in France.

Sika is a speciality chemical company which develops and manufactures products for the construction industry. The company focuses on the production of systems and products for bonding, sealing, damping, reinforcing and protecting in the building and the motor vehicle industries. The company was established in 1910 and is headquartered in Baar, Switzerland.
Wuxi Guolian Development Group operates in the home appliances, financial services, environmental protection and textiles sector. The company is based in Wuxi, China.
Eugen Schmitt engages in the production of ethanol using molasses. The company was established in 1933 and is headquartered in Weselberg, Germany.

Pungkook Corporation was founded in 1949. The company's line of business includes the manufacturing of textile bags. It is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea, with an additional facility in Ethiopia.

Al Jazeera Media Network owns and operates Arabic and English news channels. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Doha, Qatar. Al Jazeera Media Network operates as a subsidiary of Qatar Media Corporation.
column37: Mohamed Taha Tewekel, Director (Addis Ababa, Ethiopia), states: "Ethiopia is a country which is growing fast economically and going through urban and cultural change. It is, therefore, a promising new market that offers good human and commercial prospects."

column7: Trybus Group operates as a designer, manufacturer, and distributor of apparel clothing for men. The company was established in 1972 and is headquartered in DeSoto, Texas, United States.

Ontex engages in the development, production, and sale of hygienic disposables worldwide. It offers a range of feminine hygiene products, such as sanitary towels, panty liners, and tampons; baby products, which include nappies and wipes; and incontinence products; and adult products, such as light inco, pull-ups, belt diaper, all in one, shaped pads, and bed protection. The company was established in 1979 and is based in Aalst, Belgium.
column22: Southern Nations, Nationalities, and Peoples Region

column7: Carvico manufactures warp-knitted stretch fabrics. The company produces a large variety of fabrics for clothing manufacturers worldwide. It was established in 1962 and is headquartered in Carvico, Italy.

ZTE, together with its subsidiaries, is engaged in the design, development, production, distribution, and installation of various telecommunications systems and equipment in China, Asia, Africa, Europe, the Americas, and Oceania. It operates in three segments: networks (communication systems); terminals; and telecommunications software systems, services and other products. ZTE was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

column6: Eastern and Southern African Trade and Development Bank (PTA Bank)
column7: The Eastern and Southern African Trade and Development Bank (PTA Bank) provides a range of financial services to businesses and enterprises. The company offers project and infrastructure finance and participates in the investment of government securities and other non-listed equity investments. It also offers insurance and real estate rental services. PTA Bank was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bujumbura, Burundi.
Monitane Holdings, through its subsidiaries, sells branded and own-label clothing. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Dunstable, UK

Raymond Group manufactures and sells worsted fabrics in India and internationally. The company offers pure-wool, wool-blended, and premium polyester viscose worsted suiting; suiting using wool, polyester, and other specialty fibres, such as cashmere, angora, alpaca, pure silk, linen; denim and shirting fabrics; suits, jackets and trousers, jeans wear, and formal shirts; carded woollen shawls and blankets; home, auto, and institutional furnishings; and corporate wear. Raymond Group was founded in 1925 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
column22: Southern Nations, Nationalities, and Peoples Region

column7: Wuxi Jinmao Foreign Trade designs, manufactures, and distributes apparel products. The company produces men clothes, women clothes, children clothes, and other related products. It is based in Wuxi, China.
column22: Southern Nations, Nationalities, and Peoples Region

column7: Arvind primarily manufactures and sells fabrics worldwide. It operates through Textiles, Brands and Retail, Real Estate, and Other segments. It also offers denim; woven and knit fabrics; and high performance industrial fabrics for sectors, such as general industrial manufacturing and processing, infrastructure, transport, energy, and personal protection under the Mainstream, Excalibur Gant, and Flying Machine brand names, as well as under licenses and other branded products. The company was founded in 1931 and is based in Ahmedabad, India.
Sarasavi Exports engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of socks and tights for men, ladies, and children. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Pannipitiya, Sri Lanka.
column22: Southern Nations, Nationalities, and Peoples Region

column7: Direct Pay Online is a global e-commerce and online shopping services provider. The company provides online facilities supporting real-time shopping and payments, including multi card, multi currency, mobile, cross border and PayPal services. It was established in 2006 and is headquartered in Nairobi, Kenya.

Asoko Insight is a market intelligence and information services firm. It provides up-to-date management information, profiles, insights and data on unlisted companies across Africa to investors, global corporates and other African companies. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in London, UK.

Axereal collects and sells grain, as well as oilseed in France and internationally. It processes grain into flour, malt, and animal feed. The company's activities include propagation, farm production, analyses, storage, batching, product trade and marketing, and road, rail, river, and maritime logistics. Axereal was founded in 2009 and is based in Olivet, France.

The Energy Group engages in the design, manufacture and installation of  an emission control and fuel solution device designed to reduce energy usage without affecting performance. The company was established in 1989 and is headquartered in Little Falls, New Jersey, United States.
column28: Motor vehicle gasoline engines & engine parts

column7: Everest Textile manufactures and sells textile products. It engages in spinning, twisting, weaving, dyeing, finishing, printing, coating, and laminating yarns. The company offers eco material, technical fashion and causal, soft shell, stretch, air pass, multi-functional membrane, multi-functional fibre, protective fabric and medical material, and knitting fabrics. Its fabrics are used in sports, outdoor, city, casual, industrial materials, etc. Everest Textile was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.
